product.title: Boooooring Embroidered Patch
product.description: (Yawn) This embroidered patch is part of the Oxford Pennant Trouble Scouts collection where we teamed up with Keith Buckley, lead singer of Every Time I Die, super cool dad and certified Trouble Scout Sensei to create new gear for nice kids who are a little too bored (or tired, or sugared up) for their own good. This design is also available as an enamel pin. Size: 3.5" Color: White
product.descriptionHtml:
(Yawn)

This embroidered patch is part of the Oxford Pennant Trouble Scouts collection where we teamed up with Keith Buckley, lead singer of Every Time I Die, super cool dad and certified Trouble Scout Sensei to create new gear for nice kids who are a little too bored (or tired, or sugared up) for their own good.

This design is also available as an enamel pin.

Size: 3.5"

Color: White
